name: 2D Shooter (jackfhodges)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project.  I plan on creating and implementing my own theme music, as well as adding a final level and modifying the number of enemies on all three of my levels.  I will also be adding various objects to each level to further differentiate them from one another.  My main menu screen will also be changed to be more aesthetically pleasing.

Created by Jack Hodges
